name: Golden Fever
description:
You are going to have a perilous journey! Overcome deadly obstacles, dodge wild animals, fly on jetpacks, stay in the role of the round-shot for gun at a dizzying race for gold. Classical runner with three charming characters doesn't give no one second of respite. In pursuit of gold it's impossible to stop!
Our characters from these race very tired. So, collect fruits and vegetables to replenish their power!

In these race is waiting for us:
- 3 World with 35 levels;
- 3 Characters (baby Billy, pretty Molly and Jack- pumpkin head)
- 12 types of enemies
- The final battle with the boss

Help three plucky characters get to the chest with treasure and get the cherished gold!
